title: William Bagonza
text: William Bagonza (12 November 1960 – 9 December 2000) was a Ugandan <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201984%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20flyweight">men's light flyweight</a> event at the <a href="1984%20Summer%20Olympics">1984 Summer Olympics</a>.
